tool_description: Get hundreds of news from multiservices
name: Daily news
title: Daily news

api_list.name: Get news by services
api_list.description:
Filter news by available services
Get news from one of the services
Set the ID of the service:

0: **BBC**
1: **CNN**
2: **Guardian**
3: **The new york times**
4: **SMH**
5: **The sun daily**
6: **United nation**
7: **Sky news**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/service/4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/service/{seriveid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All news
api_list.description: Get all available news from all services
